name: acine-proto-dist-py
description: protobuf generation script for acine python

scripts.prepare:win32: python -m uv venv --seed --python 3.12 || .venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && pip install -e .
scripts.prepare:nix: python -m uv venv --seed --python 3.12 || . .venv\bin\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && pip install -e .

author: NovaSagittarii
